tasks.task_description: Examine DESS model architecture and identify sentiment classification components
Modify sentiment classifier to VA regression head (2 outputs)
Update loss function to include MSE for VA prediction
Update Parameter.py with DimABSA dataset configuration
Test model forward pass with sample data
Create Phase 2 testing script and validate modifications

description: Phase 2: Model Modification - Adapt DESS for VA regression instead of sentiment classification
context:
Examined DESS architecture:
- senti_classifier: Linear layer (hidden_size*3 + size_embedding*2 â†’ sentiment_types)
- Currently outputs sentiment_types (3 for POS/NEG/NEU)
- Need to change to 2 outputs for VA (valence, arousal)
- Loss uses BCEWithLogitsLoss for sentiment classification
- Need to change to MSE for VA regression

Model modifications complete:
- Changed senti_classifier output from sentiment_types to 2 (VA regression)
- Updated loss function to use MSE for VA prediction
- Modified input_reader to parse VA scores from "V.VV#A.AA" format
- Added dimabsa_eng_restaurant dataset config to Parameter.py
- Created types_va.json for VA regression

Phase 2 Testing Complete! All tests passed (5/5):
- Model code changes verified
- VA parsing working correctly
- Loss function updated to MSE
- Dataset configuration complete
- Input reader modifications validated
Files: test_model.py, test_results.json, TEST_REPORT.md
